title: Transform your startup with strategic tech leadership
subtitle: I solve problems in three key areas

items.title: Product
items.problem: Are your development timelines slipping? Do you feel overwhelmed by technical decisions?
items.solution: I help you define which features need to be developed and when. Creating a clear roadmap from idea to market-ready product.

items.title: Tech
items.problem: Struggling to choose the right technology stack? Is technical debt slowing you down?
items.solution: I lead on what technology to use, how to implement it, and when to roll it out. Building scalable systems that grow with your business.

items.title: Team
items.problem: Having trouble finding and retaining technical talent? Is your team lacking direction?
items.solution: I assist in finding and leading the best people to work in your startup, whether they are freelancers or part of an internally hired team.
